title: Mortal Kombat.Deception.PC.Emulated.Version-TMD
description:
At the end the events Of mortal Of kombat: Deadly Of alliance terrestrial soldiers - [Kitana], [Kung] [Lao], [Dzhaks], by Johnny [Keydzh] and Sonia left for the palace Of [shang] Of [tsunga] in order to conquer sorcerers and to stop their plans with respect to the reanimation of the [mumifitsirovannoy] army of king [Drakon]. But at this time success was not on the side of the defenders of the earth.

They all were killed in the struggle with the forces of [tarkatanov] and the fatal alliance.
Understanding, that it now only, who can make something, [Reyden], [oslushavshis] the desires of elder gods, into the lone person solved it will be slain from [Shang] By [tsungom] and [Kuan] Of [chi]. At first it seemed that the god of thunder will be able to conquer sorcerers, but the [obedinennaya] power Of [shang] Of [tsunga] and [Kuan] Of [chi] proved to be stronger than the fury of the god of thunder. Immediately after the victory above [Reydenom], fatal alliance was decomposed - [Shang] of [tsung] wanted to select the amulet Of [shinnoka], which makes it possible to control the army of king [Drakon] in [Kuan] Of [chi].

In the brief struggle Of [kuan] Of [chi] it left by conqueror and it seemed that no more than force, which can prevent sorcerer from guiding by peaces. But at this moment into the main hall of palace entered not who by other as itself king [Drakon] - [Onaga]. [Voskreshennyy] and thirsting to secure its conversely throne of the emperor of the external world, [Onaga] was directed to [Kuan] Of [chi] for the purpose to select amulet and to obtain control over its army.

Installation:
1. To unpack archive with the emulator of qwe.zip and to neglect it
2. To neglect with the aid of the emulator Of mortal Of kombat the means Of deception.iso
3. To play (tuning for the game by the keyboard: In the emulator Of config>Plugins>Dolphin Of kB/X360pad)
